oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Revaluing Public Sector Food Procurement in Europe: An Action Plan for Sustainability
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Recycling, balancing and resource management
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report reflects innovative approaches to public sector food procurement, and offers an Action Plan to encourage urban governments to engage in sustainable purchasing practices.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: FOODLINKSCOMMUNITY (2013) Revaluing Public Sector Food Procurement in Europe: An Action Plan for Sustainability. Wageningen University, The Netherlands.
